com.compendium.core.datamodel.services
Interface IUserService

All Superinterfaces:
IService
All Known Implementing Classes:
UserService
public interface IUserService
extends IService

The interface for the UserService class The code service class provides remote services to manipuate code objects.

Author:
Sajid and Rema / Michelle Bachler

getUsers

java.util.Vector getUsers(java.lang.String modelName,
                          java.lang.String userID)
                          throws java.sql.SQLException
Gets a Vector of all user profiles currently in the database. Generally used when Administrator makes changes to user profiles.

Parameters:
String - modelName, the name of the database to access.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException

insertUserProfile

UserProfile insertUserProfile(PCSession session,
                              java.lang.String sUserID,
                              java.lang.String sAuthor,
                              java.util.Date dCreationDate,
                              java.util.Date dModificationDate,
                              java.lang.String sLoginName,
                              java.lang.String sUserName,
                              java.lang.String sPassword,
                              java.lang.String sUserDescription,
                              java.lang.String sHomeViewID,
                              boolean dIsAdministrator)
                              throws java.sql.SQLException
Inserts a new user in the database.

Parameters:
PCSession - session, the PCSession object for the database to use.
String - sUserID, the user id the identifier.
String - sAuthor, the author name of this user.
Date - dCreationDate, the creation date of this user record.
Date - dModificationDate, the date this user record was last modified.
String - sLoginName, the login name of this user record.
string - sUserName, the user name of this record.
String - sPassword, the pasword of this user record.
String - sDescription, the description of this user.
String - sHomeViewID, the identifier of the View record that is this user's home view.
boolean - bIsAdministrator, true if this user is an administrator, else false.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException

Parameters:
session - the PCSession object for the database to use.
sUserID - the user id the identifier.
sAuthor - the author name of this user.
dCreationDate - the creation date of this user record.
dModificationDate - the date this user record was last modified.
sLoginName - the login name of this user record.
sUserName - the user name of this record.
sPassword - the pasword of this user record.
sDescription - the description of this user.
sHomeViewID - the identifier of the View record that is this user's home view.
bIsAdministrator - true if this user is an administrator, else false.
sLinkViewID - the identifier of this user's inbox.

setPermission

void setPermission(PCSession session,
                   java.lang.String sGroupID,
                   java.lang.String sObjectID,
                   java.lang.String sOldValue,
                   java.lang.String sNewValue)
                   throws java.sql.SQLException
This method is called by the permission objects to register change of permission for a single object for a group in the project. The object can be a node type or view type only.

Parameters:
PCSession - session, the PCSession object for the database to use.
String - sGroupID, the id of the group to set the permissions against.
String - sObjectID, the id of the object to set the permissions against.
String - sOldValue, the old permission value.
String - sNewValue, the new permission value.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException
